name: Trifecta
description:
In a post-apocalyptic world, a derelict set of factories are home to a treasure trove of scrapped bots and parts. To this man-made island where terraformers attempted to shape the “perfect” island, came our scrappy protagonist, in search of fame and fortune.  They aim to maneuver through the winding factories and reach the ever fabled “Junk rooms.”

NOTE: Due to the nature of this build (aka having been made by novices under a month), there are some minor bugs that cannot be resolved at this moment. One of such bugs is drones being stuck-- to solve this, try going left and right very quickly!

Fullscreen if you can! Press Esc Key to exit fullscreen

Press TAB to open the pause menu!
